gcamreport 7.0.1

gcamreport package suitable for GCAM 7.0 ðŸ’¥

Novelties:

  • JOSS Publication.
  • Allow gcamreport to be used without cloning the repository or using the .Rproj file. Now suitable for running on clustered machines.
  • Allow to specify query files.
  • Add default options for selecting database or rgcam project scenarios.
  • Add tutorials for mapping modifications and query files specifications.
  • Add and fix user checks.
  • Improve and update package documentation.
  • Improve the packageâ€™s robustness.
  • Optimize the package.
  • Clean up variables in cache.
  • Fix transport mapping.
  • Fix non-ASCII characters.
  • Reduce package dependencies.

gcamreport 7.0.0

gcamreport package suitable for GCAM 7.0 ðŸ’¥

Novelties:

  • Updated mappings to meet the GCAM 7.0 novelties.
  • Allow selection of regions and variables.
  • Add user error checks.
  • Simplify the UI launch.
  • Rename functions to make them more intuitive.
  • Fix: Report all the calculated elements.
  • Improve the documentation.

gcamreport 6.0.1

gcamreport package suitable for GCAM 6.0 ðŸ’¥

Novelties:

  • Fix project creation.
  • Introduce user messages.
  • Add a step-by-step tutorial and other tutorial examples.

gcamreport 6.0.0-gas

gcamreport package suitable for GCAM 6.0 with extra gas features ðŸ’¥

Novelties:

  • Mapping update to meet the new GCAM version requirements (with detailed gas trading features).

gcamreport 6.0.0

gcamreport package suitable for GCAM 6.0 ðŸ’¥

Novelties:

  • Creation of a template for the desired project following the IPCC requirements.
  • Friendly UI to view and subset the data items in a table, as well as to plot the desired variables choosing the desired regions and scenarios.
